io.github.tonodus.bukkit.MapGUI.api

Interface Window

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Drawable, InputListenerController
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ComponentWindow
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseWindow, DefaultComponentWindow, InputWindow

    public interface Window
extends InputListenerController, Drawable
    Can be displayed on a MapGUI

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void attachedOn(MapGUI gui) 
      void detachedFrom(MapGUI gui) 
      void drawAsync(java.awt.Graphics2D canvas)
      Called whenever the window needs to redraw itself and it's content.
      void invalidate()
      Let the window re-draw it content at the next possible moment

      • Methods inherited from interface io.github.tonodus.bukkit.MapGUI.api.InputListenerController

    • Method Detail

      • drawAsync

        void drawAsync(java.awt.Graphics2D canvas)
        Called whenever the window needs to redraw itself and it's content. Should only called from a MapGUI If you want the window to redraw itself, call invalidate()
        Parameters:
        canvas - the canvas the window is drawn on
